page.title: 04POST OFFICE
page.content: In the village there is a small Post Office.When the tide is out people get their mail early in the morning, but when the tide is in the mail is late.The Sub-Post Office has a Sub- Postmaster. His name is Ian. Every morning the Post goes on to the Mainland.Sometimes it has to go a bit early in the morning,but sometimes it has to go a bit later because the Postman is waiting for the tide to get off the road.It usually goes about 11.30a.m.The Postman is Mr.R.Patterson. Newspapers are brought at the same time as the mail.
